item.description:
Summer movie season is upon us! After XMen Origins: Wolverine, and Star Trek, Terminator Salvation is the next big-budget SciFi movie, and we're going to see it!

We all know that Christian Bale can throw a temper tantrum, but can he be convincing as John Connor? This movie will be the first to show the post-Judgement Day earth as a set, rather than solely as flashbacks. The movie premieres on Thursday May 21, but since a lot of us have to work on Friday, we're going to see it in the evening on Friday May 22 at the AMC/Loews theater on the Boston Common. The movie is at 7:30 PM, but we'll meet in the lobby from 7:00 - 7:15 PM. After 7:15, I'm going into the theater!

Link to buy tickets I strongly recommend that you buy tickets in advance, it may not sell out, but why risk it?

Information on the movie: Official Movie Website
Information on the theater: AMC Loews Boston Common 19
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby, I will be the tall white guy holding a red Meetup sign.
item.name: Movie Outing: Terminator Salvation
